name: Adebar
overview: In Adebar you control a stork who flies left to right on a scrolling screen. You can use the joystick up to flap your wings (which raises or lowers you on the screen against the variable wind pushing you) and the button to stick out your talons (then push up to dive). The objective is to deliver the baby you are carrying, when you are told it is safe to land. Along the way if you run low on calories you can grab worms with your talons. Published in issue 2-87 of AMC-Soft dated April 1987.
